extDesc.message: Extends Google Music with last.fm integration, toast notifications, a powerful miniplayer, keyboard shortcuts and more.
extDesc.description: short description of the extension (no more than 132 characters)

nothingPlaying.description: message in miniplayer when no song is loaded

gotoGmusic.description: link text in miniplayer when not connected to Google music

setting_scrobble.description: label for option to enable scrobbling

setting_toast.description: label for option to enable toasts

setting_toastHint.message: Toast notifications will not show up as long as the miniplayer is active.

openMiniplayer.description: text for button tooltip, keyboard shortcut and toast action to open the miniplayer

lastfmUser.description: label prefix for logged in lastfm user on options page and in lastfm link tooltip in miniplayer (user name will be appended)

logout.description: text for logout link (lastfm) on options page

connect.description: text for connect link (lastfm) on options page

disconnected.description: text when not connected to lastfm on options page

prevSong.description: tooltip for previous song button and toast action

nextSong.description: tooltip for next song button and toast action

pauseSong.description: tooltip for pause button in miniplayer

resumeSong.description: tooltip for play button in miniplayer

volumeControl.description: tooltip for volume button in miniplayer

playPause.description: text for toast button and keyboard shortcut to play/pause the current song

lastfmUnlove.description: tooltip for unlove button in miniplayer

lastfmLove.description: tooltip for love button in miniplayer

lastfmError.message: Error on last.fm communication, click to reload:
lastfmError.description: tooltip for love button in miniplayer on error (error message will be appended)

lastfmUnavailable.description: tooltip for love button in miniplayer when lastfm is not available (error message will be appended)

setting_toastUseMpStyle.description: label for option to use miniplayer style for toasts

setting_toastUseMpStyleHint.message: Make toasts look like the miniplayer. Otherwise toasts will appear as Chrome notifications with less functionality.
setting_toastUseMpStyleHint.description: hint for option to use miniplayer style for toasts

setting_toastDuration.description: label for option to change the toast duration

setting_toastDurationHint.message: For standard toasts this sets the time after which to remove the notification (from Desktop or Chromes notification area), Chrome might move it to the notification area earlier. For miniplayer style toasts (expert mode) this means when to close the miniplayer.
setting_toastDurationHint.description: hint for option to change the toast duration

setting_toastProgress.description: label for option to show toast progress

setting_toastIfMpOpen.message: Show toast even if the miniplayer is opened
setting_toastIfMpOpen.description: label for option to show toasts while miniplayer is opened

setting_toastClick.message: Action when clicked anywhere on the toast
setting_toastClick.description: label for option to set the action when toast is clicked

setting_toastButton1.description: label for option to set the action when toast button 1 is clicked

setting_toastButton2.description: label for option to set the action when toast button 2 is clicked

setting_scrobblePercent.description: label for option to set the scrobble percentage

setting_scrobbleTime.message: Maximum time (seconds) after that will be scrobbled (0=inactive)
setting_scrobbleTime.description: label for option to set the latest scrobble time

setting_scrobbleMaxDuration.message: Maximum duration (minutes) of a title to be scrobbled (0=inactive)
setting_scrobbleMaxDuration.description: label for option to set the maximum song duration for scrobbling

setting_disableScrobbleOnFf.description: label for option to disable scrobbling after fast forward

setting_disableScrobbleOnFfHint.message: Does not scrobble the current song after it has been fast forwarded (at least five seconds). Useful if you only search a particaluar part of a song. Otherwise, the title will be scrobbled as soon as it passes the red scrobbling marker.
setting_disableScrobbleOnFfHint.description: hint for option to disable scrobbling after fast forward

setting_scrobbleRepeated.message: Scrobble song again when played repeatedly
setting_scrobbleRepeated.description: label for option to scrobble repeated song

setting_linkRatings.description: label for option to link ratings

setting_linkRatingsHint.message: Love a song in last.fm if you give thumbs up/five stars in Google Music and vice versa. Does not override existing ratings.
setting_linkRatingsHint.description: hint for option to link ratings

setting_showLovedIndicator.description: label for option to enable loved status in icon

setting_showScrobbledIndicator.description: label for option to enable scrobbled status in icon

setting_showLastfmInfo.message: Show last.fm info in miniplayer (resize to see them)
setting_showLastfmInfo.description: label for option to show last.fm info in miniplayer

setting_miniplayerType.description: label for option to change the miniplayer type

setting_miniplayerTypeHint.message: If you want to use type 'panel', go to and activate 'Panels' to enable 'real' panels that can stay always on top.
setting_miniplayerTypeHint.description: hint for option to change the miniplayer type

setting_miniplayerType_detached_panel.description: text for miniplayer type option 'detached panel'

setting_layout.description: label for option to change the miniplayer layout

setting_layoutHint.message: Panels have an initial maximum width ad therefor do not work well with layout 'horizontal bar'.
setting_layoutHint.description: hint for option to change the miniplayer layout

setting_layout_compact1.description: text for miniplayer layout option 'compact low'

setting_layout_compact2.description: text for miniplayer layout option 'compact slim'

setting_layout_hbar.description: text for miniplayer layout option 'horizontal bar'

setting_iconClickAction0.description: label for option to choose action for 1st browser icon click

setting_iconClickAction1.description: label for option to choose action for 2nd browser icon click

setting_iconClickAction2.description: label for option to choose action for 3rd browser icon click

setting_iconClickAction3.description: label for option to choose action for 4th browser icon click

setting_iconDoubleClickTime.description: label for option to change the browser icon click speed

setting_iconDoubleClickTimeHint.message: Set to a value greater than 0 (recommended: 500) to enable more click actions above. After all enabled actions the popup will be opened, so if you don't enable any action a click will just show the popup.
setting_iconDoubleClickTimeHint.description: hint for option to change the browser icon click speed

setting_iconClickConnect.message: Always open Google Music first on click, if not opened yet
setting_iconClickConnect.description: label for option to open Google Music on browser icon click

connected.message: This tab is connected to Prime Player. Click to disconnect.
connected.description: tooltip for the 'P'-icon on Google Music page

legendTimer.description: title for the timer settings on options page

legendTimerHint.message: The timer allows you to automatically stop the music or close the Google Music tab after a specified amount of time. The settings will become available as soon as Prime Player is connected to Google Music.
legendTimerHint.description: hint for the timer settings on options page

legendLastfm.description: title for the lastfm settings on options page

legendLastfmHint.message: Here you can control the connection between Google Music and last.fm and adjust your scrobbling preferences.
legendLastfmHint.description: hint for the lastfm settings on options page

legendToasting.description: title for the toast settings on options page

legendToastingHint.message: Toasts are Chrome notifications that show you the current song and allow for some actions. Whenever a new song starts, a toast notification will appear on your screen.
legendToastingHint.description: hint for the toast settings on options page

legendMp.description: title for the miniplayer settings on options page

legendMpHint.message: The miniplayer is a powerful, highly customizable tool, so take your time to try the different options out. You can open the miniplayer e.g. by clicking on the note icon in the popup that shows up when you click the Prime Player icon in the Chrome toolbar.
legendMpHint.description: hint for the miniplayer settings on options page

legendLf.description: title for the look and feel settings on options page

legendLfHint.message: These settings control the Prime Player icon and some other general behavior.
legendLfHint.description: hint for the look and feel settings on options page

legendIc.description: title for the icon click settings on options page

legendIcHint.message: This allows you to customize the action(s) that will be executed when you click the Prime Player icon in the Chrome toolbar.
legendIcHint.description: hint for the icon click settings on options page

legendLyrics.description: title for the lyrics settings on options page

legendLyricsHint.message: You can allow Prime Player to load lyrics from songlyrics.com to show them in the miniplayer or the Google Music tab.
legendLyricsHint.description: hint for the lyrics settings on options page

setting_gaEnabled.description: label for option to enable Google Analytics

setting_gaEnabledHint.message: No personal data (e.g. played songs) will be collected. This is only to analyse commonly used features and settings.
setting_gaEnabledHint.description: hint for option to enable Google Analytics

scrobblePosition.description: tooltip for scrobble position indicator in miniplayer

setting_color.description: label for option to select the miniplayer color scheme

setting_mpBgColor.description: label for option to select the miniplayer background color

setting_mpTextColor.description: label for option to select the miniplayer text color

lastfmConnectSuccess.description: tooltip for lastfm connection success icon

lastfmConnectError.description: tooltip for lastfm connection failure icon (error message will be appended)

bugfeatureinfo.message: If you find any bugs or would like to see new features, please file an issue on $GITHUB$ or - even better - send a pull request.
bugfeatureinfo.description: text for github info on options page

setting_openGoogleMusicPinned.message: Open Google Music in a pinned tab
setting_openGoogleMusicPinned.description: label for option to open Google Music in a pinned tab

setting_googleAccountNo.message: Index of Google account to open
setting_googleAccountNo.description: label for option to select Google account number

setting_googleAccountNoHint.message: If you are logged in with multiple Google accounts, you can choose the (zero-based) index of the account to open Google Music with here. '0' always opens the default account, which is fine if you don't use multiple accounts.
setting_googleAccountNoHint.description: hint for option to select Google account number

setting_syncSettings.description: label for option to sync settings

setting_preventCommandRatingReset.message: Prevent rating resets for keyboard shortcut
setting_preventCommandRatingReset.description: label for option to prevent rating resets

setting_preventCommandRatingResetHint.message: Normally, when you rate a song with the rating it already has, its rating is reset to unrated. When you use keyboard shortcuts or the notification actions for rating, you typically don't want this, because you can't see the current rating. Deactivate this option to reset the rating in that case anyway.
setting_preventCommandRatingResetHint.description: hint for option to prevent rating resets

setting_updateNotifier.description: label for option to be notified on extension updates

setting_iconStyle.description: label for option to select the browser icon

setting_showPlayingIndicator.description: label for option to enable play status in icon

setting_showRatingIndicator.description: label for option to enable rating in icon

setting_showProgress.description: label for option to show progress in icon

setting_saveLastPosition.description: label for option to save last song position

setting_saveLastPositionHint.message: Saves the last played song with its position (locally), so you know where you left off before closing Google Music. The last song will be displayed in the miniplayer like a normal song with some limitations. The play button will try to load the song's album and resume the song at its last position. Unfortunately, it's not possible to restore your last queue or playlist on restart.
setting_saveLastPositionHint.description: hint for option to save last song position

setting_skipRatedLower.message: (or lower) rated songs will be skipped
setting_skipRatedLower.description: label for option to skip songs that have a low rating

setting_hideRatings.description: label for option to hide ratings

setting_omitUnknownAlbums.message: Omit 'unknown albums' in the album list of the miniplayer
setting_omitUnknownAlbums.description: label for option to omit unknown albums

setting_omitUnknownAlbumsHint.message: Google shows songs of an artist without album as 'Unknown Album' in the albums list. With this option enabled, those 'pseudo' albums will be hidden in the album list of the miniplayer.
setting_omitUnknownAlbumsHint.description: hint for option to omit unknown albums

setting_mpAutoOpen.message: Automatically open miniplayer, when music starts playing
setting_mpAutoOpen.description: label for option to open miniplayer on play

setting_mpAutoClose.message: Automatically close miniplayer, when Google Music is closed
setting_mpAutoClose.description: label for option to close miniplayer on Google Music close

setting_mpCloseGm.message: Automatically close Google Music, when miniplayer is closed
setting_mpCloseGm.description: label for option to close Google Music on miniplayer close

updateNotifierText.message: The extension just updated. Go to the options page to see what's new.

browserActionTitle_updated.description: browser icon tooltip when extension was updated

browserActionTitle_paused.description: browser icon tooltip when song is paused (song title will be appended)

browserActionTitle_playing.description: browser icon tooltip when song is playing (song title will be appended)

browserActionTitle_scrobbled.description: browser icon tooltip when song is scrobbled (will be appended to the paused/playing message)

browserActionTitle_connected.description: browser icon tooltip when connected to Google Music but no song is loaded

emptyList.description: message for empty lists in miniplayer

loadListError.message: The list could not be loaded.
loadListError.description: message when a list could not be loaded in miniplayer

noLyricsFound.description: message when no matching lyrics have been found (in miniplayer and Google Music)

loadLyricsError.message: The lyrics could not be loaded.
loadLyricsError.description: message when no lyrics could be loaded (in miniplayer and Google Music)

quicklinks.description: title for quicklinks view in miniplayer

welcomeTitle.description: title for notification that is shown directly after install

welcomeMessage.message: The extension has a bunch of options that you can adjust to fit your needs. Also note the FAQ on the extension's homepage at the Chrome Store. And now have fun with Prime Player!
welcomeMessage.description: welcome message that is shown in notification directly after install

toOptions.description: text for 'to options' button in welcome notification

toWiki.description: text for 'to wiki' button in welcome notification

feelingLucky.description: tooltip for feeling lucky button in miniplayer, keyboard shortcut and toast action

setting_coverClickLink.message: Open on click on album cover
setting_coverClickLink.description: label for option to select action on album cover click

setting_titleClickLink.message: Open on click on song title
setting_titleClickLink.description: label for option to select action on song title click

quicklink_now.description: text for click action option 'listen now' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

quicklink_artists.description: text for click action option 'artists' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

quicklink_albums.description: text for click action option 'albums' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

quicklink_genres.description: text for click action option 'genres' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

quicklink_rd.description: text for click action option 'instant mixes' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

quicklink_ap_queue.description: text for click action option 'queue' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

quicklink_ap_auto_playlist_thumbs_up.description: text for click action option 'higly rated' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

quicklink_ap_auto_playlist_recent.description: text for click action option 'last added' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

quicklink_ap_auto_playlist_promo.description: text for click action option 'free and purchased' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

quicklink_ap_shared_with_me.description: text for click action option 'shared with me' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

quicklink_ap_google_play_recommends.description: text for click action option 'recommendations' (will be replaced with text from Google Music if connected)

openLink.description: tooltip for cover/title link in miniplayer

backToLink.description: tooltip for back button in miniplayer

backToPlayer.description: tooltip for back button in miniplayer when on 'first page'

setting_openLinksInMiniplayer.description: label for option to open links in miniplayer

setting_openLinksInMiniplayerHint.message: If enabled, links to albums, artist etc. will be opened directly in the miniplayer, otherwise in the Google Music tab. Using Shift+Click you can switch this behavior temporarily.
setting_openLinksInMiniplayerHint.description: hint for option to open links in miniplayer

setting_lyrics.description: label for option to activate lyrics

setting_openLyricsInMiniplayer.description: label for option to open lyrics in miniplayer

setting_openLyricsInMiniplayerHint.message: If enabled, lyrics will be shown in the miniplayer, otherwise a new tab will be opened. Using Shift+Click you can switch this behavior temporarily.
setting_openLyricsInMiniplayerHint.description: hint for option to open lyrics in miniplayer

lyricsAlert.message:
This feature requires access to songlyrics.com to load the lyrics.
Please note that not Prime Player but songlyrics.com is responsible for the quality of the search results. Prime Player always shows the first search result from songlyrics.com. So it is possible that the shown lyrics don't match the song. You can check the search results with the links at the bottom of the lyrics page in the miniplayer.
lyricsAlert.description: warning message on first lyrics feature activation

setting_hideSearchfield.description: label for option to hide search field

setting_connectedIndicator.message: Show 'P'-icon on connected Google Music tab
setting_connectedIndicator.description: label for option to show the Prime Player icon in Google Music

setting_lyricsAutoReload.description: label for option to auto reload lyrics

setting_lyricsInGpm.message: Enable lyrics in Google Music tab
setting_lyricsInGpm.description: label for option to enable lyrics in Google Music

setting_lyricsFontSize.message: Font size (in pixels) for lyrics in miniplayer and Google Music
setting_lyricsFontSize.description: label for option to change the font size for lyrics

setting_lyricsWidth.message: Width (in pixels) of lyrics panel in Google Music
setting_lyricsWidth.description: label for option to change the width for the lyrics panel

moreThanOneDay.description: playlist duration info if list is longer than 1 day (will be appended to list name)

searchPlaceholder.description: placeholder text for search box in miniplayer

searchResults.description: title for search results view in miniplayer

command_.description: text for no toast action (on options page)

command_loveUnloveSong.description: text for love/unlove current song in toast action and keyboard shortcut

command_volumeUp.description: text for volume up in toast action and keyboard shortcut

command_volumeDown.description: text for volume down in toast action and keyboard shortcut

command_volumeMute.description: text for volume mute in toast action and keyboard shortcut

command_toggleRepeat.description: text for toggle repeat in toast action and keyboard shortcut and button tooltip in miniplayer

command_toggleShuffle.description: text for toggle shuffle in toast action and keyboard shortcut and button tooltip in miniplayer

command_ff.description: text for fast forward in toast action and keyboard shortcut

command_rate1.description: text for rate 1 in toast action (if not connected to Google Music) and keyboard shortcut

command_rate2.description: text for rate 2 in toast action and keyboard shortcut

command_rate3.description: text for rate 3 in toast action and keyboard shortcut

command_rate4.description: text for rate 4 in toast action and keyboard shortcut

command_rate5.description: text for rate 5 in toast action (if not connected to Google Music) and keyboard shortcut

command_showToast.description: text for keyboard shortcut to show toast

command_thumbsUp.description: text for thumbs up toast action (if connected to Google Music)

command_thumbsDown.description: text for thumbs down toast action (if connected to Google Music)

command_star1.description: text for rate 1 star toast action (if connected to Google Music)

command_star5.description: text for rate 5 star toast action (if connected to Google Music)

command_openLyrics.description: text for open lyrics in toast action, keyboard shortcut and tooltip of lyrics button in Google Music

lyricsFor.description: tooltip for song title link in miniplayer lists and lyrics button

lyricsTitle.description: title for lyrics in miniplayer while loading (will be replaced with title from songlyrics.com after load)

lyricsSrc.description: text for the lyrics source link at the bottom of the lyrics in miniplayer and Google Music

lyricsSearchResult.description: text for the lyrics search result link at the bottom of the lyrics in miniplayer and Google Music

loadLyrics.description: title for lyrics panel in Google Music while loading

lastfmInfo_userplaycount.description: text for user scrobble count on last.fm (shown in tooltip/info area)

lastfmInfo_playcount.description: text for total scrobble count on last.fm (shown in tooltip/info area)

lastfmInfo_listeners.description: text for total listeners count on last.fm (shown in tooltip/info area)

configShortcuts.description: text for link to open the keyboard shortcuts settings

timerPreNotify.message: seconds to warn before before timeout (0=do not warn)

timerAction_closeGm.description: label for timer action option to close Google Music

timerAction_pause.description: label for timer action option to pause music

startTimer.description: label for button to start timer

stopTimer.description: label for button to stop timer

timerNotificationMsgPause.message: The music has been stopped because the timout occured.
timerNotificationMsgPause.description: Message for timeout notification with pause action

timerNotificationMsgCloseGm.message: Google Music has been closed because the timout occured.
timerNotificationMsgCloseGm.description: Message for timeout notification with close Google Music action

timerNotificationBtnPause.description: Message for timeout notification button with pause action

timerNotificationBtnCloseGm.description: Message for timeout notification button with close Google Music action

timerWarningMsgPause.message: The music will automatically be stopped in $SEC$ seconds.
timerWarningMsgPause.description: Message for timeout warning with pause action

timerWarningMsgCloseGm.message: Google Music will be closed in $SEC$ seconds.
timerWarningMsgCloseGm.description: Message for timeout warning with close Google Music action

cancelTimer.description: label for notification button to cancel timer

filterHint.message: Here you can limit the visible options.

notificationsDisabled.message: Notifications are disabled for Prime Player, so only miniplayer style toasts are available.
notificationsDisabled.description: warning message if notifications are disabled
